text: Christopher Michael Pilkerton is an American lawyer and politician. He was the acting Administrator of the Small Business Administration from April 2019 through January 2020. He was an assistant director of Law and Public Policy at the Catholic University of America and a Senior Counselor to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Lawyers from New York City Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:1973 births Category:Administrators of the Small Business Administration
title: Chris Pilkerton
